https://image.tmdb.org/t/p/w500/lQjrMnBjKiWhwtlpEe6HI1ZXPkA.jpg Sue Klebold attempts to reconcile how the son she affectionately referred to as "Sunshine Boy" became a school shooter. "If love could have stopped Columbine," she says, "Columbine would never have happened." American Tragedy
